Q3 How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements?  Q3a I would rather be a citizen of [COUNTRY] than of any other country in the world.

Q3 How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements?  Q3e People should support their country even if the country is in the wrong.

Q6 How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements?  Q6d International organizations are taking away too much power from the [COUNTRY NATIONALITY] government.
Q6 How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements?  Q6e I feel more like a citizen of the world than of any country.

Q8 Some people say that it is better for a country if different racial and ethnic groups maintain their distinct customs and traditions. Others say that it is better if these groups adapt and blend into the large society.  Which of these views comes closer to your own? a) It is better for society if groups maintain their distinct customs and traditions. b) It is better if groups adapt and blend into the larger society.

question: Q11 Which of these statements about immigrants comes closest to your view: - Immigrants should retain their culture of origin and not adopt COUNTRY's culture.  - Immigrants should retain their culture of origin and also adopt COUNTRY's culture.  - Immigrants should give up their culture of origin and adopt COUNTRY's culture.

answer.1: Immigrants should retain their culture of origin and not adopt COUNTRY's culture
answer.2: Immigrants should retain their culture of origin and also adopt COUNTRY's culture
answer.3: Immigrants should give up their culture of origin and adopt COUNTRY's culture
